content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Baihu Li, thank you for considering my apartment for rental. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. Based on the location and size of the apartment, I was thinking of asking for a monthly rent of 800 Euros. What are your thoughts on this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 800 Euros. Thank you for your offer. I will move in after a month.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Great! I'm glad you found the price acceptable. If you have any questions or concerns before moving in, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. I'm looking forward to having you as my tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to negotiate with you. I think that 800 Euros is too high for this apartment. Can you lower the price?

I understand that you need to make some profit on the apartment, but I would appreciate it if you could be flexible and lower the price.

I am a student and I have limited income, so I would like to find a more affordable option.

I am very dependable and responsible, so I would like to prove myself as a good tenant.

I am willing to sign a long-term lease agreement if that helps lower the price.

I believe that this apartment is in a great location and I would like to stay here for a longer period of time.

I am open to discussing alternative payment options, such as a lower rent and a security deposit.

Please let me know if there is any other information that I can provide to help with the negotiation.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment and for your willingness to negotiate. I understand your concerns and I am willing to be flexible. Based on your qualifications as a tenant and your willingness to sign a long-term lease, I am willing to lower the rent to 750 Euros per month. In addition, I am open to discussing alternative payment options, such as a lower rent and a security deposit. Please let me know if this is acceptable to you and if you have any other questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
